# RSSim

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of RSSim is to learn statistical simulation using the [Simulation](https://shop.elsevier.com/books/simulation/ross/978-0-323-85738-3) textbook by Ross Sheldon.

## Installation

You can install the development version of RSSim from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("j-buss/RSSim")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(RSSim)
## basic example code
```
